    • Constructor Detail

      • particles

        public particles(double x,
                 double y,
                 int n,
                 java.awt.geom.Point2D dir,
                 double mag,
                 double maxs)
        This constructor generates particles emerging from a single point.
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate of the point.
        y - The y coordinate of the point.
        n - The total number of particles.
        dir - The direction of the initial force.
        mag - The magnitude of the initial force.
        maxs - The max size of the particles.

      • particles

        public particles(java.awt.geom.Line2D l,
                 int n,
                 java.awt.geom.Point2D dir,
                 double mag,
                 double maxs)
        This constructor generates particles emerging from a line.
        Parameters:
        l - The line from which the particles emerge.
        n - The maximum number of particles on the screen.
        dir - The direction of the initial force on the particles.
        mag - The magnitude of the initial force on the particles.
        maxs - The maximum size of the particles.

    • Method Detail

      • setColor

        public void setColor(java.awt.Color c)
        Sets color of the particle.
        Parameters:
        c - The color with which the particle color is to be set.

      • update

        public void update(java.util.ArrayList<knifeThrow.tile> p,
                   java.awt.Graphics2D g)
        Updating the particles in the particle system.
        Parameters:
        p - The array list containing the tile objects with which the particles cacn collide with.
        g - The Graphics2D object to render the particles.
